com.ibm.async_util.locks

Interface AsyncReadWriteLock.WriteLockToken

  • Enclosing interface:
    AsyncReadWriteLock

    public static interface AsyncReadWriteLock.WriteLockToken
    A lock token indicating that the associated lock has been exclusively acquired for writer access. Once the protected action is completed, the lock may be released by calling releaseWriteLock()

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AsyncReadWriteLock.ReadLockToken downgradeLock()
      Downgrade this write lock acquisition to a read lock acquisition without any intermediate release.
      void releaseWriteLock()
      Release this write lock, allowing readers or other writers to acquire it.

    • Method Detail

      • releaseWriteLock

        void releaseWriteLock()
        Release this write lock, allowing readers or other writers to acquire it.

      • downgradeLock

        AsyncReadWriteLock.ReadLockToken downgradeLock()
        Downgrade this write lock acquisition to a read lock acquisition without any intermediate release. This may allow other waiting readers to proceed with their acquisitions. Other writers, however, may not proceed until the returned read lock token (and any others that become acquire) is released.

        The returned AsyncReadWriteLock.ReadLockToken becomes the principle token for this acquisition; this calling WriteLockToken should not be released afterwards, and may be abandoned freely.

        Returns:
        a ReadLockToken representing read lock exclusivity on the lock
